unnormalised: Regarding the application of AI in agriculture, a recent report by the Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare projects a 20% increase in crop yield by 2025, facilitated by AI-driven solutions like precision farming. Further research is needed to validate these findings, especially considering the diverse climatic conditions across India.
normalised: Regarding the application of A-I in agriculture, a recent report by the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare projects a twenty percent increase in crop yield by two thousand and twenty five, facilitated by A-I-driven solutions like precision farming. Further research is needed to validate these findings, especially considering the diverse climatic conditions across India.
